meanings.sent1: The weather forecast foreshown rain for tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She foreshown her excitement by jumping up and down.
meanings.sent3: The magician foreshown the disappearing act but forgot to bring the rabbit!
meanings.sent4: The old clock foreshown the passage of time with each tick.
meanings.sent5: His dream foreshown the upcoming challenges he would face.

meanings.sent1: The signs had foreshown the arrival of the storm.

meanings.sent3: The movie foreshown the twist ending right from the beginning.
